identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York
Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Hospitality, Restaurant and Travel

block.p: Joe Mizrahi has cooked pulled pork, brisket and barbecued chicken at his Staten Island catering company, Smokin' Joe's True-Blue Texas Barbecue, for several years (smokinjoesbbq.com). Now he is taking his food to the Tribeca Tavern, 247 West Broadway (Walker Street), where sandwiches ($7 to $8) and platters ($9 to $10) with potato salad, coleslaw and plenty of sass, will be served at lunchtime on Fridays and Saturdays during the TriBeCa Film Festival, which starts today and runs until May 6. Mr. Mizrahi said the Friday barbecue lunches and perhaps the Saturday ones will be available all summer.

Mr. Mizrahi said the Friday barbecue lunches and perhaps the Saturday ones will be available all summer. FOOD STUFF
